column1: [CBI] :    CTRL C    : kill the process in focused terminal
[CBI] :    kill pid  : to kill the process refered by processus-identity (pid)
[CBI] : 	top -u <user>    : to see only the process of user  (without <>)
[CBI] : Kill process directcly from the GUI of htop :
[CBI] : 	Select with mouse the process ------> F9 -----> ENTER
[CBI] :  ps aux               : to see all pid
[CBI] :  ps aux|grep <user>   : to see pid of user     (without <>)
